welcome_message_body: Welcome to Suzuka, Japan! Known for its iconic Suzuka International Racing Course and beautiful natural surroundings, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city during your visit.

restaurants.name: 洋食 Mogu
restaurants.description: 洋食 Mogu is a yoshoku restaurant located in 鈴鹿市.

restaurants.name: ジョリーパスタ 鈴鹿店
restaurants.description: ジョリーパスタ 鈴鹿店 is a italian restaurant located in 鈴鹿市.

restaurants.name: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 鈴鹿中央店)
restaurants.description: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 鈴鹿中央店) is a chinese restaurant located in 鈴鹿市.
restaurants.address: 西条町真虫原415-1, 鈴鹿市, 三重県, 513-0808

restaurants.name: COCO'S (ココス)
restaurants.description: COCO'S (ココス) is a japanese family restaurant located in 鈴鹿市.

restaurants.name: イタリア食堂Passione
restaurants.description: イタリア食堂Passione is a italian restaurant located in 鈴鹿市.
restaurants.address: 神戸2-15-18 (かんべ再開発ビル1F), 鈴鹿市, 三重県, 513-0801

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi network by registering with their email address or through social media accounts.
